A unique collaboration has come to life between Andy Warhol, a seminal figure in 20th-century art, and KAWS, a leading artist in contemporary art. features.text: DRY-EX' fabric quickly absorbs and wicks away moisture to keep your skin feeling fresh.
The cuffs and hems are knit, with no sewing, so they feel soft against the skin and there is no visible stitching from the front, giving it an elegant look.
The round-body design with no side seams reduces stress on the skin. The mesh under the sleeves and underarms provides good breathability.
Uniqlo U

items.longDescription:
- The odor control, deodorizing, sweat-absorbent, and quick-drying functionality makes it ideal for times when you sweat, such as during exercise.
- The casual-looking fabric is easy to style, even when not playing sports.
- Uniqlo U’s signature roomy fit with wide shoulders and long sleeves.
